text:
TIM TUNNARD                                                                               
EXPERIENCED SALES LEADER  
LOCATION: YORKSHIRE, UK  
PERSONAL 
STATEMENT   A sales leader with a demonstrable successful track record in sales growth, sales team 
management, new business development, national account management and enterprise sales in 
the IT and software market. A loyal, hardworking, determined individual, highly  motivated,  and 
extremely thorough with a passion for technology. Excellent relationship builder at all levels, 
results driven, and customer focused. Experience of selling into manufacturing, transport & 
distribution, food & beverage, facilities management , utilities , pharma,  and healthcare sectors.  
KEY SKILLS   Well -developed relationship management, proven plan TIM TUNNARD                                                                               
EXPERIENCED SALES LEADER  
LOCATION: YORKSHIRE, UK  
PERSONAL 
STATEMENT   A sales leader with a demonstrable successful track record in sales growth, sales team 
management, new business development, national account management and enterprise sales in 
the IT and software market. A loyal, hardworking, determined individual, highly  motivated,  and 
extremely thorough with a passion for technology. Excellent relationship builder at all levels, 
results driven, and customer focused. Experience of selling into manufacturing, transport & 
distribution, food & beverage, facilities management , utilities , pharma,  and healthcare sectors.  
KEY SKILLS   Well -developed relationship management, proven planning, organizational, and people 
management abilities.  
Experienced in all aspects of sales process including lead generation, marketing campaigns, bid 
management, exhibiting, networking, requirements gathering, demo, close, project kick -off and 
account management.  
All round communication (mediation, negotiation,  and persuasion)  
Strong commercial awareness.  
Solid problem solving, decision m aking and analytical capabilities.  
Results focused - individual and team targets achieved consistently.  
Deep understanding of Software, SaaS, Professional Service pricing and selling.  
EXPERIENCE   SENIOR BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER, PEACOCK ENGINEERING LTD  
August 2019 to present.  
Responsible for strategic accounts and enterprise solution sales at Peacock. Peacock are an IBM 
gold business partner and a leading asset management consultancy delivering an end -to-end  
solution combining scheduling,  Maximo asset & work management, mobility and BI. Responsible 
for new business and account growth through networking, calling, events, social media,  and 
marketing campaigns. Liaising with SI’s and other tech companies to co -ordinate and managing 
complex bi ds for large projects.  
Exceeded all sales targets to date and developed a healthy, balanced pipeline of opportunities.  
Taken responsibility as Sales SME in the business for Manufacturing, Facilities Management and 
Utilities/Energy.  
HEAD OF SALES – SSG INSI GHT 
December 2015 to August 2019  
Day to day running of the sales dept. during a period of business growth. Focusing on team 
management and mentoring and new business development, closely involved in strategic 
management of key accounts.  
Monitoring of service levels and interaction with c ustomers throughout the life of software 
implementation projects and helping to steer enhancements to the products and services that 
we offer to our ever expanding and increasingly diverse customer base.  
Full responsibility for company sales performance an d CRM system.  
Turnover increased from £1.2m to £ 5.2m whilst maintaining profit targets.  
HEAD OF SALES AND MARKETING – SOFTSOLS GROUP  
June 2007 to December 2015  
Responsible for driving the growth and development of an established business in the facilities 
and maintenance management software industry by introducing new technology, marketing 
initiatives and partner development.  

Page 2 Recruitment, development and managem ent of the group’s sales and marketing team. 
Responsible for the creation and implementation of the company’s online and offline sales & 
marketing strategies and activities.  
NATIONAL ACCOUNT MANAGER – FESA LTD.  
June 2005 to June 2007  
Successful management  of major retail and food service accounts including category 
management. New business and new product development to maximize volume and profit.  
Day to day management of sales of approximately 50 fresh products. Administration of pricing 
structures and pr omotional strategies. Account management including Morrisons, Sainsburys, 
Aldi and Co -op. 
Procurement, co-ordination,  and communication to ensure efficient production of all orders at 
maximum profit and customer service level agreements.  
ACCOUNT MANAGER & GENERAL MANAGER – MBM LTD. (PREMIER FOODS)  
January 2000 to June 2005  
Full P & L accountability for Organic Produce Division. Effective management of production, 
procur

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
